name: City Detective Challenge
description: Investigate urban issues as a city detective using data analysis and citizen engagement

name: Data vs. Context: The Citizen Challenge
description: Learn to analyze data while understanding its context and limitations in decision-making processes

name: FactBusters
description: Investigate and verify facts in digital information to combat misinformation

name: Whisper Walls: Investigating the Sound of Silence
description: Explore the acoustic environment and its impact on urban life and well-being

name: CO2 sensors for indoor air quality
description: Monitor and analyze indoor air quality using CO2 sensors in educational environments

name: Mapping of pollinators through counting
description: Study urban biodiversity by mapping and counting pollinators in city environments

name: Light vs. Zzz - The Great Sleep Battle
description: Investigate the impact of urban lighting on sleep quality and circadian rhythms

name: Decibel Detectives - Correlation between noise and learning abilities
description: Investigate how urban noise pollution affects learning and cognitive performance

name: SoundSquad - Sensitive mapping of noises across the city
description: Create detailed noise maps of urban areas using collaborative sound measurement

name: Outdoor air quality monitoring, particles and impact of weather
description: Monitor outdoor air quality and analyze the impact of weather conditions on pollution

name: Smart Objects Safari - Involve learners in the design of smart objects
description: Engage students in designing and creating smart objects for urban applications

name: Ecological impact of the regulation of mobility
description: Analyze how mobility regulations affect urban ecology and environmental sustainability

name: Road signs of tomorrow
description: Design and prototype next-generation road signs for smart mobility systems

name: Energy and Everyday Life - Negawatt Scenario
description: Explore energy efficiency and conservation through negawatt scenarios in daily life

name: Experimenting with Energy Mix
description: Experiment with different energy sources to understand optimal energy mix scenarios

name: Shine Smart, Shine Bright - Understanding Urban Lighting
description: Optimize urban lighting systems for energy efficiency and citizen well-being

name: Energy in perspective - Understanding energy
description: Develop a comprehensive understanding of energy concepts and their urban applications

name: From Warm Walls to Cool Cities: Investigating Insulation and Urban Heat Loss
description: Study building insulation and urban heat loss to improve energy efficiency in cities

name: Discover bio-inspired learning processes
description: Explore learning algorithms and processes inspired by biological systems

name: Bot Buddy Adventure - Designing a Chatbot for Urban Fun
description: Design and develop chatbots for engaging urban exploration and education

name: AI Odyssey - Datawalk in the city
description: Explore how AI can analyze urban data to improve city services and citizen life

name: Optimised waste sorting thanks to AI image classification
description: Use AI image classification to optimize waste sorting and improve recycling efficiency

name: Birdsong AI Explorer
description: Use AI to analyze and identify bird sounds in urban environments for biodiversity monitoring

name: Plants and the city
description: Study the role of plants in urban environments and their impact on city sustainability

name: Trees VS Cars - Use decision trees to identify polluting vehicles
description: Apply machine learning decision trees to identify and analyze vehicle pollution patterns
